name: Dive Thou Demon
description:
Help Lyncus find all the treasures, and go back home to hell. 

Hint: try to collect things that fits on the pillars.

Note: if cursor is stuck in middle of the screen, try AltTabbing.

We did not upload browser version of the game, because there was major problem with audio.

Programming : GerbilArt: SinigangShakeMusic & Audio : Dmytro Nebesh
